attributes.action: The people all over the world say do something to help the children and babies abuse now
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
This petition is asking the government to look at guidelines for children who are on the at risk register to not leave them in a home to continue being abused if a responsible body such as Police and social services believe the child can come to further harm. 
Give the police more power to remove a baby or child such as Baby P   
An overhaul of social services needs to be done now. however, in the mean time please look at putting out new guide lines or a law as a temporary measure to ensure any children are safe from hurt and harm.
